lines.text: Well fa... you've had quite a day haven't you?
What about their speaking in English?
I saw this dolphin on television and he could count from 1 to 10 in English.
Really? I must have missed that.
Do you think its some kind of trick or something?
Yes... yes its just a trick.
Are you blackmailing me Mr Mahoney?
Goodness no... I'm just an average person with an above average curiosity... and of course I don't make make friends easy
